topic: Food waste is a major problem in developed countries while others face starvation. What are the causes of this issue and what measures can be taken to address it?
essayText:
Food waste big problem in rich country. Poor country people no food. This not fair.

Why people waste food? Because they have too much money and buy alot. They throw away when not finish. Supermarket also throw food when old. Restaurant make too much food everyday.

People dont care about waste food. They never hungry before so dont understand. Food cheap for them.

How to solve? Government must make rule for supermarket. Cannot throw good food. Must give to poor people. Also teach children in school about food waste.

Maybe use phone app to share food. Restaurant can sell cheap at night.

So food waste because people rich and dont care. Need education and new rule to fix problem.
